Key Match Events: Glenn Maxwell was named Player of the Match
Post-Match Reflections: Matthew Wade (Australia) expressed hope that David Warner and Aaron Finch will be fit for the semi-finals if they make it
Mohammad Nabi (Afghanistan) discussed the team's performance, including their struggles with momentum due to washouts and the loss of four wickets in a row
Miscellaneous Highlights: The match was played in Adelaide, Australia, on November 4, 2022, as part of the ICC Men's T20 World Cup 2022-23
